msg.msgText:
The values of configuration items of "Endpoint" composite object can be obtained using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show Endpoint help imaserver show Endpoint "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver show Endpoint "Name=TestEP"
The following configuration items are returned:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
